analysis.description:
OldToken (/unique_chucks/34/0x120f0d6335429cb7b57db4987325f2cf9788a0a9.sol#98-105) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/34/0x120f0d6335429cb7b57db4987325f2cf9788a0a9.sol#98-99)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x120f0d6335429cb7b57db4987325f2cf9788a0a9.sol:
	Contract quaker has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x120f0d6335429cb7b57db4987325f2cf9788a0a9.sol#238-240)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0x120f0d6335429cb7b57db4987325f2cf9788a0a9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/34/0x120f0d6335429cb7b57db4987325f2cf9788a0a9.sol#5-7): it allows old versions
